alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 9:39PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Corson and western Dewey Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 937 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow wind along a line extending from near Shadehill to near Glad Valley to near Intersection of Cherry Creek and Sunnybrook Roads to 8 miles northwest of Cherry Creek. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorm winds will be near... Lantry around 955 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Eagle Butte, Isabel, Firesteel, Parade and Black Horse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
